queries.title: Optional 2 - User Defined Functions
queries.description: Optional User Defined Functions (UDF) (cf 4.3 in ADQL-2.1).

query.description: Any function not declared in ADQL-2.1 is considered as a UDF. As the usage of a prefix is not mandatory, the UDF name is totally free, though it is highly recommended to prefix the UDF with `ivo_` for official IVOA function (already used in more than one service ; cf the Catalogue of ADQL User Defined Functions). The prefix could also be the service or institute name, if such UDF is not used anywhere.
query.adql: SELECT id, ivo_healpix_index(6, ra, dec) AS hpx FROM atable
